New Records: Ja Morant achieved his 12th career triple-double with 26 points, 14 assists, and 10 rebounds
Key Match Events: Ja Morant took over the game in the first half, scoring 21 points, and making 9 assists and 8 rebounds, and also made a notable assist on a reverse dunk to Santi Aldama
Pre-Game Insights: The Grizzlies came out with much more energy after looking lethargic in their previous loss to Brooklyn
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies snapped a two-game skid with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks have lost four straight games
The Grizzlies ended the night shooting 52% from the field
The Bucks were 9 for 42 from 3-point range
Others: Damian Lillard continues to struggle with his shooting, going 1 for 12 in the game and missing all six of his 3-pointers
The Grizzlies' lead reached 31 early in the fourth quarter
